code: export function setStorage(key,value,time){var data={value:value,expirse:new Date(time).getTime()};localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(data));}export function getStorage(key){var data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key));if(data!==null){if(data.expirse!=null&&data.expirse<new Date().getTime()){localStorage.removeItem(key);}else{return data.value;}}return null;}
